description:
When the powerful yet mentally unstable Ricardo Kidel gets hold of a nuclear missile, he plans to use it to launch a devastating coup d`etat. Najica and Lila must infiltrate his luxurious yacht and foil his diabolical plans. But their mission has one added complication - not only is the missile guarded by a Humaritt, but our hero duo is under orders to capture this Humaritt and deliver her to Gento. 
With Kidel`s plans already in motion, Najica and Lila will have to move faster than ever if they`re to have any hope of success!

titles.title: A Crimson Horizon Appears with an Empty Dream
Ein roter Himmel und ein vergänglicher Traum
Shinkou no Somaru Suiheisen wa Hakanaki Yume to Tomo ni
深紅に染まる水平線ははかなき夢と共に
